mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD_TYPE ORDER BY BOARD_CD

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICK, READ_COUNT, BOARD_CONTENT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 THEN TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'HH:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DT
FROM BOARD JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CD) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_CD = ${boardCode} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT RECOMMEND_NO, RECOMMEND_TITLE, RECOMMEND_CONTENT, RECOMMEND_IMG, RECOMMEND_HOMEPG FROM PLACE_RECOMMEND

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = ${boardCode} AND BOARD_ST = 'N'
AND
BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'
BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
( BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%' )
MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%${query}%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICK, READ_COUNT, BOARD_CONTENT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 THEN TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'HH:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DT
FROM BOARD JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CD) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_CD = ${boardCode}
AND
BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'
BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
( BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%' )
MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%${query}%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') UPDATE_DT, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, BOARD_NM FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CD) WHERE BOARD_NO = ${boardNo} AND BOARD_ST = 'N'
